message: I'm anti clarkson, but not because he swears and is offensive. I love sweary, offensive people - most of my friends (and myself) can claim that title too :) I'm anti clarkson because he punched an underling in the face, which is indicative of his more general pomposity and arrogance. It is a shame that the people who love the show will lose it, but I think the bbc are right to suspend him - we shouldn't allow this workplace bullying to be ok for some, but not for others.

Alright, history lesson time for all of you young idiots, ESPECIALLY you, . Your statement, """"If you want cops and people of other ethnicities to respect you, you have to respect yourself"""" is probably one of the most misleading statements that you can make! This country, this society has been systematicalli programed to denigrate and disrespect black people for over 400 years! Yes, respect yourself, but do NOT fool youself into thinking that translates into other races and cultures respecting you! Do you think that because you are educated and have a good job that you are respected as a black man? In this society? We have ti demand the respect as human beings that has been denied us for centuries! Tell me, how are YOU showing tga you care about """"us""""? How do YOU react when the young black kid is killed with a toy gun in his hand, yet the old white man that has been shooting at the police is somehow taken into custody without injury? Is that your definition of """"respecting yourself""""?
